00023 EmfPaintDevice::EmfPaintDevice(const QSize& s, const QString& fileName) : QPaintDevice(),
00024 d_size(s)
00025 {
00026         engine = new EmfPaintEngine(fileName);
00027 }
00028 
00029 EmfPaintDevice::EmfPaintDevice(const QSize& s, unsigned long memSize) : QPaintDevice(),
00030 d_size(s)
00031 {
00032         engine = new EmfPaintEngine(memSize);
00033 }
00034 
00035 EmfPaintDevice::EmfPaintDevice(const QSize& s) : QPaintDevice(),
00036 d_size(s)
00037 {
00038         engine = new EmfPaintEngine();
00039 }
00040 
00041 EmfPaintDevice::~EmfPaintDevice()
00042 {
00043         delete engine;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void EmfPaintDevice::setFontFiles(const QStringList &fontFiles)
00047 {
00048     if (engine)
00049         engine->setFontFiles(fontFiles);
00050 }
00051 
00052 QPaintEngine * EmfPaintDevice::paintEngine () const
00053 {
00054         return engine;
00055 }
00056 
00057 int EmfPaintDevice::metric ( PaintDeviceMetric metric ) const
00058 {
00059         switch (metric){
00060                 case QPaintDevice::PdmWidth:
00061                         return d_size.width();
00062                 case QPaintDevice::PdmHeight:
00063                         return d_size.height();
00064                 case QPaintDevice::PdmWidthMM:
00065                         return int(25.4*d_size.width()/engine->graphicsObject()->GetDpiX());
00066                 case QPaintDevice::PdmHeightMM:
00067                         return int(25.4*d_size.height()/engine->graphicsObject()->GetDpiY());
00068                 case QPaintDevice::PdmNumColors:
00069                         return 65536;//should it be millions?
00070                 case QPaintDevice::PdmDepth:
00071                         return 32;
00072                 case QPaintDevice::PdmDpiX:
00073                 case QPaintDevice::PdmPhysicalDpiX:
00074                         return int(engine->graphicsObject()->GetDpiX());
00075                 case QPaintDevice::PdmDpiY:
00076                 case QPaintDevice::PdmPhysicalDpiY:
00077                         return int(engine->graphicsObject()->GetDpiY());
00078                 default:
00079                         qWarning ("EmfPaintDevice::Unknown metric asked");
00080                         return 0;
00081         }
00082 }
